title: 【A week of husband lunch boxes】#36 | Pork miso soup | Dokinchan

media:group.media:title: 【A week of husband lunch boxes】#36 | Pork miso soup | Dokinchan
media:group.media:description:
*Sorry that was a typo 06:43. The seasoning is actually sake, mirin, soy sauce and sugar. Thank you !!

⏰Timestamp🍱
00:03  Tuesday / pork & green onion fried rolls, Mayo & oyster sauce broccoli salad, Furikake
04:30  Wednesday / Corn fried rice, marinated beef [ pepper lunch bento ] 
08:00  Thursday /
     👝Grocery haul
     🏡Dinner / fried saury, pork & veggie miso soup[Tonjiru], okura salad
     🧔🏻‍♀️Huswashing time 
17:18  Friday / cheese, potato, pork rolls, tamagoyaki, cabbage salad, fried parsley 
21:33  Saturday / mayo & miso salmon, umeboshi rice seasoning

[ About  bento lunch box ]
[ Does my husband heat the bento or eat it cold? ]
He eats the bento at room temperature. That is natural things for us. but I know many people (also Japanese) wanna heat it. so I recommend you to use the lunch box that is fine for microwave, if you wanna heat it ;)
